origin_prompt.content: 我需要评估退休后的生活质量。首先，获取我当前的生活费用和预计退休年龄。然后，获取我所在地区的生活成本指数。接着，获取我所在地区的退休福利政策。最后，提供一个基于这些数据的退休生活质量评估。

prediction:
To assess the quality of life after retirement, we will need to gather the following information:

1. Current living expenses: This includes all the expenses you incur on a monthly basis, such as rent/mortgage, utilities, food, transportation, healthcare, entertainment, and any other recurring expenses.

2. Expected retirement age: This is the age at which you plan to retire from your current job.

3. Location-specific living cost index: This is a measure of the cost of living in your area, taking into account factors such as housing, food, transportation, and other expenses. A higher index value indicates a higher cost of living.

4. Retirement benefits policies in your area: These include any government-sponsored retirement benefits, such as Social Security, pensions, and any other age-related benefits available to you.

With this information, we can provide a retirement life quality assessment based on the following factors:

1. Income sufficiency: This will be determined by comparing your expected retirement income to your current living expenses. If your income can cover your expenses comfortably, you can expect a high quality of life after retirement.

2. Cost of living adjustment: This will be based on the location-specific living cost index. If the cost of living in your area decreases after retirement, your quality of life may improve due to the reduced expenses.

3. Retirement benefits: If you have access to a comprehensive retirement benefits package, this will likely contribute to a higher quality of life after retirement.

4. Availability of affordable healthcare: Healthcare costs can be a significant expense in retirement. If you have access to affordable healthcare options, you can expect a higher quality of life.

5. Access to recreational activities and social engagement: Retirement provides an opportunity to pursue hobbies and interests that may not have been possible during working years. Access to affordable recreational activities and social engagement opportunities can contribute to a high quality of life.

Based on the factors mentioned above, we can provide a comprehensive retirement life quality assessment that takes into account your current living expenses, expected retirement age, location-specific living cost index, and retirement benefits policies in your area.
